east - Variable in class mig.view.DirectionPanel
 
Enigma - Class in mig.core
Class Enigme This Class creates an Enigma.
Enigma() - Constructor for class mig.core.Enigma
Default Constructor This Enigma is just a simple sentence There is no answer waited , and the isResolved is set True Example: the PNJ will only tell a default sentence : Hello, i can not talk to you.
Enigma(String) - Constructor for class mig.core.Enigma
Default Constructor This Enigma is just a simple sentence There is no answer waited , and the isResolved is set True

Constructor for an Enigma with an Item as answer

Constructor for an Enigma with a String as answer
enigma - Variable in class mig.core.NPC
a PNJ has an enigma to ask to the player.
enigma - Variable in class mig.view.EnigmaView
 
EnigmaItem - Class in mig.core
The class EnigmaItem represents all the list of items that we can win answering an Enigma.It uses inheritance from the class Item The items which can be won after an Enigma are : An information (from the class Information) a physical object (from the class PhysicalObject) These two items, Information and PhysicalObject uses inheritance from this class EnigmaItem.
EnigmaItem(String, String) - Constructor for class mig.core.EnigmaItem
Constructor
EnigmaView - Class in mig.view
Instantiate all the variables that will need to be display
EnigmaView(JFrame, String, Game, NPC, Window) - Constructor for class mig.view.EnigmaView
